host.host_about:
Hello. I am a very passionate person with whatever I do. I love adventures and travelling. 
I love meeting and talking to people of any race, color and gender. I think I can learn something from every person I meet and I value learning so much that  

Hope to meet new friendships on my travels.

reviews.comments: It was exactly as the descriptions states: "a comfortable stay". I just stayed for one day and everything was nice. Comfortable private bedroom. Lane and her sister helped me in everything I needed at any time. I definitely recommend it for a short stay close to the JFK airport!! Thanks for everything Lane!

Great host. Was very nice, clean, quiet apartment.
Really appreciate the hosts, friendly people.
Will be staying again!
That's a wonderful stay in New York. Lane and her sister is helpful for our stay and (Website hidden by Airbnb) can cook  and get everything as our want.

I had a nice time in a peaceful atmosphere. Clean place and quiet area, even if it's located in Jamaica Queen. 8 minutes walk from the f and e lines that go downtown. A perfect stay if you are on a budget and really good hosts.

I stay in many an AirBnB, and most I judge on the accommodations alone.  This time it was Lane's warmth and hospitality that stood out.  The place was exactly as described and Lane was wonderful.  I hope to stay there again.
Amazing host, very welcoming and great communication.

Had a one day layover in JFK and wanted to see Queens! Close to airport and train to the places in NE Queens I wanted to visit, then continued on to Manhattan and eventually made it back to JFK. Laney was helpful and made sure I got there alright and followed up with me the next day. Great place to get some sleep and be ready to explore in the morning. About a $20 cab ride from JFK-- was easier than navigating train later at night after long day.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lane was very responsive to my messages. Lane's sister was very friendly during my stay and made sure I had everything I needed. The room itself is quite comfortable, and I slept great! Quiet and clean apartment in a nice neighborhood. Train is just a short walk away. Just be sure to bring your own towel and soap. Well worth the money,  5/5 would stay again.

We had a great stay here! From the moment we (My 4y/o Godson and I) arrived we felt welcomed and very accommodated. Annette made sure we were comfortable and even texted to check on us when we didn't come back one night. She is the best! Its clean, has a nice kitchen, and its in a nice neighborhood... a quick walk to the subway. She made me feel like I was a part of their family and that meant a lot because I am here alone. I wish we could've stayed longer and will definitely return if need be... Thanks so much, Ladies!!

Omg where do I start?!?! Lane is so sweet and gorg. She answered all of my questions before I arrived. I felt so comfortable that I had to hug her when I saw her. We didn't interact because I was so tired and had a flight to catch in the morning. Her sister welcomed me when I arrived. The sheets were clean, the room is as pictured but I was cold in the middle of the night (but I'm always cold) also someone started playing music at 11pm until 11:45pm. It was very loud but not Lanes fault. I'd stay with Lane again

Lane was very responsive with any questions I had.  I never met her but she was very friendly and helpful.  Check in was with her sister who was also cordial.  Room is basic, nothing special, but enough for me who just needed a place to sleep, shower, and store luggage.  Lane was nice enough to let me check in early and leave luggage / chill on the couch for a while.  Good place if you don't need anything fancy.
Lovely people.. Quietly neighborhood.. if u on vacation in Queens the best spot to sleep is here people.

Lane was on a trip that day and her sister Annet took care of me. The host is very nice and easy going. The room is like how it was shown in the picture. The bed is soft and comfortable. The apartment is on the third floor and there's no elevator. The place is 10 minutes of walking distance to the nearest subway station.
Nous avons été accueillis gentiment par la sœur de Lane. La literie était confortable et propre. Quartier calme, pas très loin du métro , environ 15 minutes de marche.

Lane's sister arranged my arrival as Lane as out of town. If you need a good rest/sleep, this room is the perfect choice as it's incredibly calming and quiet. The house is very clean and the people were nice and quiet. The neighborhood is one of the better/safer neighborhoods in New York. NB: the layout is a bit confusing despite it being a grid system, and asking for directions can be rough as the people don't really know where the street is.

Wonderful experience.  Everything was just as it was advertised and the hosts were very accommodating.  The bed was comfortable, the neighborhood was quiet, and the price was right.  I will definitely be staying here again next time I frequent New York.
This listing is located in a really nice and safe neighborhood. Even though it is just for one night, I have a really comfortable stay.

Lane and Annette, her sister made me feel more than welcome, the room looks exactly like what was listed. The neighbourhood, very peaceful and about fifteen to thirty minutes drive from the JFK Airport, depending on traffic. Annette was available to describe to the cab driver just how to get to the apartment which was extremely useful considering my taxi was metered.

I had been in the air for a total period of 22 hours so I thought I would just rest a little and then go out a-discovering the Queens neighbourhood, thanks to information already supplied by Annette, but the peace and basic comfort of the room and surroundings conspired to ensuring that I did not wake up until much later in the night when most shops were closed or near to closing.
Pleasant stay at this place. Safe neighborhood. Accessible to subway. Friendly host who made us feel at home. Will definitely recommend to friends.

Although i got a little lost on the way there, Lane came down to greet me and made me feel at home for the one night I stayed! Everyone was friendly and kind, and they advised how best to get to JFK from the flat. Very big and comfy bed, clean and warm apartment. Would definitely stay again!

My interactions were with Lane over the mail and Anett in person. Both were polite and accomodating people and even helped me with directions, what transportaion to take etc. The room and the house itself were pretty well maintained and neat. The bed was large enough for 2 people and comfortable. The neighbourhood was also pretty safe and quite. A good experience over all.

Nice neighborhood.  Room was just as advertised and clean. 
 
I first arrived at three and easily found parking.  I left and came back around 7:30 or so.  I had to park a couple of blocks away. But the neighborhood was so nice it didn't bother me at all. (Just as a planning tip) 

When I first got to the apartment I met Annette, Lane's sister, and she was very, very nice. 
Lane handled the communication and logistics well. 

Would definitely stay again.

Anette was a really great host she is so nice and helpful. This was my first time visiting New York and she helped me get around. The area was nice and quiet I would definitely go back the next time I go to New York.
Very comfortable.  And responsive tinny request for late check in !

Lane was really accommodating and ensured everything was in order for the stay.The location is accessible and easily accessible for travelers going to JFK/LGA .
I appreciated her flexibility in timings and overall communication before and during the stay.

Lane was great to communicate with from the very start and Annette was a wonderful host. The apartment is located in a nice quiet neighborhood, and is on the third floor with no elevator access. The room was as pictured. This is a no frills place lived in by several people. There is a small shared bathroom that could use a bit of TLC. It was fine for my one night stay after many hours on a plane.

Lane and her sister were really nice hosts. I felt like home and they were really flexible with my arrival and leaving time. The room is clean and comfortable. Manhattan is circa 1 hour distant. Thanks for hosting!
Simple, effective, comfortable, convenient, accommodating and communicative.  Really great experience.  :)
Lane is a really kind person and friendly. And the room is clean and the apartment area is really quiet place. If I have a chance to visit NY again, I will stay her apartment again!!
Everything was fine I would come beck.

Very nice trip at Lane and her sister's house. They were very flexible and available. They answered all of our questions before and during our stay. Nice location, less than 15 minutes walking from the train station (line E & F, which have a lot of stops in manhattan!) Highly recommended !

The room was as advertised. 

After a long work day and walking and photographing Brroklyn Bridge, the room was perfect for sound sleeping. 

The host agreed for late check in and she came to the road to help me with funding the apartment. 

Quite and comfort.
The address was not accurate, however as a person she was amazing.
Cítil jsem se velice dobře, podmínky byly skvělé a hostitelé přívětiví, i když jsem dorazil ve 2:00 ochotně pomohli se zavazadly a popřáli dobrou noc.

Great, quiet neighborhood not too far from JFK! We got in really late, our flight delayed, but Lane and her sister were so understanding. The room was just as described-- quaint but perfect for a good nights sleep and the train into the city is <15 minutes walk from the house.

Lane was out of town during our visit but her sister, Annette, was very sweet and accommodating. She was always helpful and went out of her way to make us comfortable. It was a very clean apartment and a very nice stay.

It was a wonderful place, exactly as described. 
They are a very friendly family :)

I interacted primarily with Annette and not with Lane.  Annette was nice and friendly and gave helpful instructions.  The room was nice and private and clean.  Bathroom was also clean.  They let me put some food in the refrigerator over night.  Nice neighborhood - although warning for drivers is that it is not easy to find parking in this neighborhood.  Great value for the price.

We had a brief but comfortable stay at Lane's home - she made us feel welcome. The bed is large and the room has plenty of space. Plus, under 10 minutes walk to the subway was convenient for access to the rest of New York.
Friendly and well organized. The communication was uncomplicated and open, the room nice and clean. Unfortunately we didn't meet Lane but her sister did the whole communication and organization.
Lane and anette were very nice with me and my cousin, they made us feel like we were at home. I had a wonderful experience and i hope we can go back soon to their place.
Great host! Kind and available. However the room was terribly hot it was insanely crazy. I hope she installs an AC for the stay to not be as brutal for the summer clients. But great location too!

Lane hat mich abends erwartet und hat mir zugesichert, ich könne auch erst um 11 pm kommen. Gott sei dank war mein Flug pünktlich und die Einreise verlief ohne Verzögerung, also konnte ich schon um 10pm in mein zimmer. Durch den Flug war ich sehr erschöpft und ging nach einer kurzen Dusche gleich ins Bett. Das Zimmer ist geräumig und mit einem großen Bett und einem Ventilator ausgestattet. Der war auch dringend notwendig, da es in New York im Juli sehr heiß ist. Lane war sehr freundlich und aufmerksam. Da ich aber am nächsten Tag schon um 5 am aus dem Haus bin, kann ich recht viel mehr auch nicht sagen. Die Nacht war ruhig und angenehm. Danke für die Gastfreundschaft, Lane!
Very comfortable and quiet place. Annette was very kind and a great host. Quick at responding. Near transportation and shops. Would recommend to a friend!
This is a really good location considering the price. We had no problems getting around. Host is very nice and accommodated all of our needs. Highly recommended

Annette and Lane were friendly. Contact via email prior to arrival was easy and Lane always responded quickly. During our stay we didn't have much Interaktion with Lane and Annette though,  since we were gone exploring the city most of the time. The room was fine and just like depicted, but, as mentioned in previous comments, quite hot. The subway was only a short walk away, however, if there were constructions or delays, it sometimes took us over an hour to get into Manhatten - so just be aware of that. If you are planning to cook while in New York, I wouldn't necessarily recommend their place as the kitchen was rather poorly equipped and the cupboards above the stove were pretty greasy. Altogether: if you are just staying for a couple of nights and don't expect to be right at the edge of Manhatten, it's a good place to stay at.

I had a fantastic stay in Lane's apartment!
The area was really quiet and perfect to relax and get a good sleep after a full day of touring New York. I had keys to the apartment and was able to come and leave whenever I wanted to.
Lane's sister was my contact person during the stay and the friendliness and hospitality really stood out - thanks for the great accommodation, would love to come again when I re-visit NY!
She was very good and welcoming.
Lane and Anette were very hospitable we had so much fun staying at their place!!

a great comfortable stay just as described.
and very nice hosts ;)
it was very nice to meet you!
Very accommodating and friendly. Pleasant stay.

Lanes home is a nice place in Queens and we slept there for one night. There are two ventilators, but they don't cool as much as a Air-Condition would - for one night it's ok, for longer I wouldn't stay here again because it gets really warm. The neighborhood is nice, there are some restaurants around and the subway links to NYC. We didn't see Lane but her sister and she was nice welcoming us and allowing us to leave our baggage for some more hours.

Place was clean and cozy. Was greeted by Lance's sister, Annette, who was very friendly. Parking is difficult, but should be expected as such. Enjoyed my stay, and would definitely choose them again if I do this trip again.
Хозяйка очень гостеприимна ,помогла со всем что я просила,спасибо большое)
Communicative & helpful host, easy booking, good value for being New York.

It was a pleasant stay, they had no problem with out late arrival ( 2:30 a.m.). It is a simple, but comfortable room. Is important to note that if you bring a lot of luggage you will have to carry up over 3 floors of stretch stairs. We have little interaction with Annett, since we arrive late and just stay there for the night.
Clean and quiet.
It was a comfortable stay, thank u very much
Everything was as expected. Had no problems.
Nice cozy and quiet place.

Lane and her sister Anette were very easygoing, they were always in contact.   The neighborhood is very calm and safe, really close to the subway station that connects JFK airport to Manhattan.   The house and room was very clean, and quiet which makes it  excellent to have good a comfortable rest.  They allowed me to leave my luggage before and after check-in so that I could do some sightseeing in the area.  I recommend them a lot!

Even though we have never met Lane, we have met her sister Anette, which was also very nice and easygoing with our late hour of arrival. Our room was very simple and small but enough for two people (I would recommend to be careful around the corners of the bed). Althought there was a slight effort of communication between us and Anette, I didn't really feel that welcomed like with our previous hosts, which might have made me look little bit uneasy. There was also very big traffic around the single bathroom which took away little bit of our privacy. In any case the apartament title is not misleading. It was a very clean and comfortable stay.

We were welcomed on our arrival and our questions were answered immediately. We had a very comfortable stay. We have shared bathroom but it does not make our experience less pleasing. Kudos to the cleanliness of the house and restroom. Though we only have two fans in our room, we slept quite comfortably. Our stay in New York is like staying in a new home away from home. We do not have issues on safety. The walk towards Union Turnpike Station is around 10mins from our place. Lane's place is highly recommended for tourists and travelers who needed a room to stay for their vacation.
Everything was just like the photos!
Hi! Nice and kind people. Nice talk. Thank you some much!
Good communication with me from check in to any needs and questions that I had, nice location for 40min train ride to city, nice sunny basic room

Hey guys, for sure the best host in NY if you want an affordable place close to transportation(that's the only way around NY) stay here she's respectful clean and punctual. Also I came to her place at 3AM after a great night and she stood up till I got there, bad on my part kind on hers, point is lane is a great host enjoy your stay.
Great place to stay!
Lane and Anette were very nice people with us. They supported us in getting any place we asked. Hope we can come back soon!
Very accommodating and friendly! They made everything easy :)

Lane's sister, Anette, was my host. She was very friendly, helped me on everting I needed and was always available to help. The house was pretty confusing for me to find the first time, but once I knew, was easy to access. The house was very clean, the bedroom bigger than what I expected and the bed was pretty comfortable. Thank you!
i felt welcome and well taken cared. i thank the host for giving an equivalent home even if i am away from home

I had a very comfortable stay here. Lane was very friendly and helpful. 
The neighborhood has a nice calmness to it, and it's a short walk to Main Street in Kew Gardens Hills which has numerous eateries and grocery stores, if you are looking for that. 
10 minute walk to the E/F express train to Manhattan, on Queens Blvd.
Lovely room in quiet 3rd floor.  Nice quiet roommates live there.  Very close to Metro and many shops.  I recommend dining at Forest Hills area which is only 1 metro stop away.

If you have a car be prepared to spend at least 1/2 for parking. 
Ask for bed sheets.
I enjoy my stay over. The host was really helpful and friendly. But you have to walk to the subway 15min. For the price I would say this is a good place
She is nice and hospitable.

The  Apartment is Exactly as the pictures show. Room and Bathroom are very clean. Hosts are very responsive to Texts and Phone. No Frills ...Great Price .....Ride to Times Square by Train ...About 35 Minutes ...All Good ...Great valve !
Lane is wonderful, love her! great value n she was super flexible!! I liked the location because it was a quiet n welcoming neighborhood. it's a little remote- which is a plus in my opinion!!

Lane and Anette are wonderful! The room is quite small and the bathroom is shared. Location isn't ideal if you're wanting to walk around but it is close enough to the metro so you can get into the city! Perfect place to stay if needing a stopping point while flying. Be aware that the room is on the third floor of an apartment complex.
So kind and accommodating! Perfect for a quick overnight stay in NY!
Good! Clean!
Very friendly hosts, clean apartment. Would definitely recommend.
Great place and Lane was very homely and helpful. Enjoyed my stay
Definitely a great place to stay and MOST definitely GREAT host. They helped & assisted me like I was family. Will definitely be back!
Both Lane and Anette was very kind and helpful. Lane's place is very close to the airport (JFK), we got there quickly with taxi. We really enjoyed staying there. We recommend you to stay there.

We had a great stay at Lane's place. We did not meet Lane, but her sister Anette who was willing to answer questions and attentive. This is a great option for those looking for a place close to JFK like we were.
Lane is a really sweet, kind person and her apartment was very clean
Lane's place was great. The room and bathroom were clean. Annette was fantastic and super helpful. I would definitely recommend this place!
Room is great
Lane was excellent and very accommodating to my late arrival because of weather.
Lane's place is perfect and comfort for me. I lived there 5 days, I felt comfort all days. Annette is kind for me. Subway station is so near, and easy to move other area.

Fantastic location just a short walk from the F and E train station to Manhattan as well as the shops and restaurants along Queens Blvd. We were hosted by Anette, who was very gracious, friendly and accommodating the entire trip. The apartment and the guest room was clean and pleasant. The apartment is located on the third floor of the building and it is worth noting the room lacks central air conditioning but there are quiet fans placed in the room so it's not a big deal. I definitely recommend this as a great value for anyone who wants somewhere to stay in Queens.
Really nice people. I enjoyed my stay 100%. Location is the best cause you're just 30 min +/- from the airport JFK, and just 25 min in subway from 5th avenue. Thanks for all and I'll be back soon.
Lane was extremely helpful and friendly, it was a pleasure to stay with her!
Great stay
Easy to access. Kind reception. Everything good but no air conditioner
Clean and quiet
I really recommend this place. It was very easy to find and close to the airport. Lane is very nice. I will repeat for sure.
Anette was a fantastic host & couldn't ask for better accomodations.  Thanks
God communication easy check in
Very sweet host! The room was very comfortable and looked like the photos. Also, the house was well Kept.
Perfect place to spend the night ! Really close to St. John's university which was just what I needed .
Great communication, clean and comfortable.
Nice place, very clean and comfortable.
Excellent place. Very reasonable price. The host is kind and nice.
I had a wonderful stay here. It was quiet and clean. Exactly what I needed for my first night in New York.
Was good, easy public transport an close to the airport
Lane was not around because of the work but her sister treated very well. I recommend this place to stay. Next time I am in New York, I will stay here. Affordable price for valuable service.

Location is perfect, near to subway station Kew Gardens Union tpke, E train goes straight to Manhattan ! Room is nice, clean, wifi .. Lane and Anette are very lovely ! I will definitely stay at that  place next time I go to NYC !!
Great room, very cool especially during the hot August nights. Very accommodating host

Whilst I did not meet Lane herself her sister Annette was incredibly warm and welcoming. The flat/room is very clean and comfortable after long forays into the city. Its also a great location, as the express subway into Manhattan is a short walk away.

Great host. Enjoyed my stay.

Lane and her sister, Anette, are so sweet! This is a perfect place if you're thinking of exploring the city and you need a place to sleep. Although I would've felt very comfortable hanging out in the apartment, we were only in NYC for a few days and wanted to do exploring.

Coming and going was never a problem, and we had our own set of keys to go in and out. I wish I could say more but we were literally always out and about. Towels were available when we needed them and also extra blankets. There isn't air conditioning in the room but the fans kept it cool. 

I would definitely stay here again!
Lane was a wonderful host and her place is nice, quiet and clean. I loved everything about my stay and I definitely recommend it to anyone who wants value for money.
We stayed well.
I had a good time staying at Lane's place. Clean and comfortable bed. I would recommend this place if u need to stay in Flushing.
Nice place, friendly host, quiet neighborhood and easy access. Lane it's very attentive to our needs.
Great location close to the subway. Although I never met Lane, her sister was very friendly and helpful
If I have chance I will stay Lane's house again.
Very nice place :)
Everything was very good and in accordance with the description. I haven't met Lane, but her sister Anette was a very helpful and friendly person. Recommended.
Lane and Anette are nice people. I enjoyed my accommodation.

It was great place to stay. Short walks to shops and metro and it was a very cozy clean room in a quiet neighborhood. She was very warm and helped my partner and I partner with anything we needed. We would definitely recommend this to other folks who stay in New York.

The place is only ten minute walk to the nearest subway station and 30 min ride into Manhattan. The neighborhood felt very quiet and safe our entire stay. Originally planned on arriving in the evening but due to some delays on our end we had to arrive in the middle of the night. In spite of this, Lane and her sister were very gracious ensuring we made it safely and welcoming us when we got there.  The apartment was very clean and you get your own set of keys to go in and out as you wish. Overall great affordable place to stay and super friendly hosts. Would stay again.
Recommend it
Nice people....read the description.
Great place. Only needed a place to sleep for a layover but it was clean, quiet, and hospitality was great.

It was absolutely wonderful! Lane and Annette were very-very sweet, bed was comfortable and I liked cozy living room as well. You can use kitchen, bathroom is always clean. The area is safe, once I came back at 4 a.m. and I had no problems. Close to the JFK airport and La Guardia airport, taxi to the JFK airport is about 20$.It takes 30-40 min to get to Manhattan, which is not bad for such a big city. I spent in this apartment about 10 days and I was always happy to come back after a long day. Highly recommend!
Perfect room to stay at for airport connections or subway. Quiet area, easy to find, warm hospitality. Took the stress out of  my 1-night layover through JFK.
Great spot that’s close to transit and JFK. The home is a welcoming environment no matter what time of day. Excellent spot in Queens!

We did not get the pleasure of meeting Lane, however, her sister Anette was outstanding in hosting us. There was fast communication, easy check-in, and close metro access. Would definitely stay here again.
Lane is very accomodating and very responsive. The place is just a walking distance to subway which is great. It's safe even if you walk by midnight. I will definitely come back here.

Cozy room, very close to the public transport, just 22 min from 5th av by underground line E! Hosts are the best and they take care about you all time. It’s my second time here and I’ll come back soon for sure!!! Thanks for all!
The hosts are very friendly and cooperative, The room was nice. Maybe the bathroom was clean, but needs maintenance.
We just needed a quick place to crash between flights and this was the perfect solution. Annette was very friendly and helpful. The room is quiet and comfortable.
The place is exactly as Lane described and she was a very nice host!
Annette was a truly hospitable host. Good place to stay with no frills.

Everything was just as described in the description of the place. Really quiet neighborhood, perfect to get some rest after a day in nyc. Definitely  recommend, I Would stay again, Thanks for everything!
Lanes sister Anette was very nice. It was a good value for the price!
Lane is warm and the room is very comfortable.
Safe neighborhood, walking distance to trains, clean and quite room.
I needed to stay one night in New York this option was best i found on Airbnb. Everything really was great)

Lane and her sister Anette were excellent hosts. I was actually out and about pretty much the whole time from the moment I landed so I only dealt with Anette, but she was super friendly and pleasant. They keep their place clean and presentable so be sure to take your shoes off at the door! Their spot is in Jamaica, Queens and about an 8-10 min walk to the F and E trains at the Kew Gardens stop so it's super easy to get to and from the city and JFK. If you love NY pizza as much as I do, there's a spot not far from the trains on Queens Blvd right next to the McDonlads and a cafe as well as other eateries and shops. However, if you'd prefer to cook, they do have a kitchen, which I did not take advantage of. Again, I was out and about pretty much the whole time, but Lane's place is an excellent place if you need a clean bed and shower. Oh, and if I'm not mistaken I saw a Keurig, which I also did not take advantage of, but if you need some caffeine to start your day, then boom!
Very pleasant lady and very clean space
A warm, inviting home. Lane's sister Anette is a wonderful host. Thank you again

Great option for anyone needing a place to stay close to JFK airport.  The location is within walking distance from the Kew Gardens E/J Subway, and close to stores and fast food.  It is also right next to a major highway in Queens, which makes for easy road access.  The exact apartment is a bit hard to find so I recommend communications with Lane as the date of the stay gets closer so that she can help you find her place and coordinate your check-in.  The room is located in a third-floor apartment, and you need to use stairs to get there.  Lane is a fantastic host.  She is very responsive on email and helpful.  In all, I had a good experience because of the location and Lane's hospitality.
To far from the city
Everything was OK. Lane's sister Anette is a good host! Thank you
The apartment was clean, quiet, and located close to JFK.

Lane's sister Anette was very helpful and showed great hospitality.  The room was very clean and spacious too. I would definitely stay there again. Also, the location was great and very close to jfk!  definitely recommended
Lane was welcoming and courteous. The space was big, clean and comfortable besides from the hiccup at check in which was not the host fault. My stay was comfortable and would stay there again

Lane & Anette were incredible hosts! It’s a great little getaway for someone who will only be in the city for a few days. Awesome place, with even better hospitality. Will be back to return!
Close to subway station & JFK Airport, and it's good for a one night rest before leaving NYC.

I didn’t get to meet Lane but I did meet her sister, Anette. She was very kind and welcoming, and she would answer every question that I had. As for the place, good location. I didn’t think it would be an issue, but it was very hot (32 degrees Celsius) that day so it definitely would have been nicer to have had ac. Other than that, very hospitable hosts and they have all the amenities like was mentioned.

Our one-night-stay was great, we met Anette, Lane‘s sister: The room and bed were comfy, and there were fans, which cooled the room down. All in all, it was a great place to land after our flight from Europe. The neighborhood is quite and Anette was very helpful.

It’s an older building but it’s obvious that they keep it clean and tidy. Anette, Lane’s sister lives there, cleans it, and communicates with you. She is very kind and hospitable. Note that there are other long term renters in the apartment too.
Nice quiet place, close to the airport. It takes about 5-7 minutes to get to the nearest metro station.

Very quick response and very kind. Lane will help you everything they can. Location is not that far from the subway ;around 10 mins walk. Shared bathroom is not bad ,they keep it clean. Great to stay! If I go back to New York I will stay here again :)

Nice little room basically to sleep in. You're in NY so if you were planning on only staying in your room your entire trip then you'd be disappointed with the space because you get what you pay for...But like I said I was practically never there just to sleep or shower...Everyone was quiet and the place was clean...Not having AC was different since coming from Florida we always have the AC blasting but thankfully was cool enough to have the window and fan blowing. It's a decent place to keep your belongings as you explore the city.

First, we liked the fast responses. The explanations about the check in and about the location were great! The room is spacious  and clean. Also there were 2 fans in the room. We would like to stay again.

Great place

name: Large railroad style 3 bedroom apt in Manhattan!
summary: Spacious 3 bedroom apartment. 2 are railroad style (must go through one to get to the next) and the additional bedroom is at opposite end of the apartment for extra privacy. Well equipped open kitchen. Large living room with additional fold out couch. Great apt for a weekend in NYC.  10 min walk to Central Park.
space: Beautiful Railroad style NYC apartment with exposed brick. Larger than what most people expect to get in NYC. Located in and old Italian neighborhood that has slowly turned into El barrio (The latin neighborhood of manhattan). This combination is amazing since you will be staying next to one of NYC's oldest brick oven pizzeria, Patsy's, and one of NYC's best Italian restaurants RAO's, plus a plethora of LatinAmerican and Mexican restaurants at walking distance.

transit: the 6 train is 4 avenues away, 10 min away from upper east side and 20 min from midtown. 1 block away from the FRD (highway) which allows for a fast ride downtown if taking a cab or an uber. M15 express bus on 2nd avenue is very convenient for getting downtown as well. Walking distance from M60 bus to La Guardia airport.

The place had a fully stocked kitchen, bathroom with shower and bath, a mac and a tv with apple tv. The neighborhood was good it was a 10 minute walk to the nearest subway station and a short walk to central park.
The apartment was very nice, clean and near to the metro. It was really great to stay at this place.

Vick was an excellent host. he was very flexible with my last minute changes and made sure I had everything I needed. he's pretty laid back so everything went smoothly. 
The appartment was nice, very close to grocery stores and transportation.  
I spent an excellent time in NYC and loved Vick's place. 
Thank you man. 
Joad
Overall great location and experience for what we were looking for. Surrounding area is slightly questionable late at night. No complaints about the space.

Vick was easy to contact.  We aligned on a time to arrive and leave and there was a lot of flexibility.  Great host, apartment was described well and really quiet inside despite being in a city.  Thanks

Vick was very easy to communicate and has been honest from the first contact to the last. His house was clean and had enough space for 7 people. He was also very flexible with our last minute changes. He was kind to check-in with us throughout our visit. His house is great for large groups with good service and affordable price in NYC. Overall, he made our first Airbnb experience great. I'd love to stay again.

Our stay at Vicks apartment was amazing. Vick always responded quickly to any questions I had and was very helpful with everything. His apartment looks exactly how it does in pictures but even nicer in person. He was also very flexible with check-in and check-out times. I would definitely stay here again.
Vick's place is really nice and spacious. Vick is really a nice person and he has a flexible check in and out time.
Was a great host. Got everything we needed!

Vick's place was just as described in the pictures. We were so happy that the space was clean and in a decent neighborhood. I traveled with three other guest and we all had plenty of room to sretch out. The two living areas were used as additional sleeping place which we ended up using. Rooms in the house were on separate ends making for more privacy. 
My flight had been delayed multiple times, Vick was nice enough to allow my guest to check in without me. He and his sister, Maria were very fast in responding to our needs and even checking on us to make sure we were okay. 
Due to late flight departure, both Vick and Maria allowed later check out times to accommodate us. I would recommend this spot for small groups and I would love to stay here again! 
Thanks so much! Trip successful!

Great Location with supermarkets close by and only 5-10 minutes walk to the subway station. Two bedrooms with comfy beds and towels. Good shower and a living room. Old building with little light but that was no problem for us. We enjoyed our stay very much.
A great apartment for groups and wonderful communication from the hosts.
Vick was a great host.  Extremely easy to get a hold of and immediately responded to any questions.

We loved this place! Very clean and slept 3 very comfortably. There’s a shopping center across the street with a Costco, Marshall’s, Old Navy which was great. Will definitely try to stay again next time I’m in the area.
整体来说一般,地段位置还算不错,距离市中心和景点二十多分钟车程｡房子本身感觉不好,房屋格局就像走廊一样的,长条形,只有两端两个房间有门,私密性一般｡只有一个很小的浴室,非常不方便,不适合大家庭入住｡床单和毛巾显得老旧,而且房屋没有洗衣机,对于多日入住的旅客,毛巾不能换洗很麻烦｡我们住的房间床单有黄色痕迹｡房东还算不错吧｡价格并不便宜,性价比很低,个人觉得酒店会好很多｡要求不高的可以尝试｡

Vick was an AMAZING host. He checked in frequently, quickly responded to any questions, and was super nice. The air bnb is very cozy & has plenty of bed space. I would definitely stay at this air bnb again.

The house was also very good and the heaters worked quite well! The kitchens basically had everything we need and the wifi was also very fast!

Vick's apartment was very cozy and pretty. We just had a problem with the check in but it all went well ! I recommend this apartment and you have Target just next to the house which is very cool. Thanks Vick.

host.host_about: Welcoming host who wants you to enjoy the beautiful surrounds at Coogee Beach

reviews.comments: My stay at David's Coggee Beach house was excellent. It's a big house with 10 large bedrooms, and common livingroom and large kitchen, deck (super nice) and bathrooms (3 bathroom area with individual shower (nice one), sink and toilet). I met nice people who gave me good advices to get around Sydney. David, the host, is very responsible and responded on the post to my emails while I was there. Being large, the house is very quiet and no one really bother anyone else. A cleaner shows up everyday, they were two ladies when I was there. They do an amazing job keeping the place spotless, and they are also very sweet. Now, Coggee is an amazing place. The house is up the street from the beach- there is also a large green park next to the beach. It's really nice. I went swimming at the ladies bath (sometype of sea water swimming pool on the beach) the first morning despite being Winter: amazing! I find that the picture showing Coggee beach do not make justice. It is so much more beautiful. I can't wait to go back there. (details: bus are down the street, Sydney downtown is 25min away, the airport is 20 min away (35$ for a cab), Bondi beach is 2 beaches away :p (20min), and peroquees are all around:)

David introduced himself almost immediately on arrival and made me feel welcome. Place was exactly as posted. Other guests were interesting, courteous and helpful. Room was comfortable as was the bed. Large, easy share kitchen well organized and clean. The only negative (for me with recent hip replacement surgery) was all hand washing sinks except kitchen sink were one flight of stairs down. Immediate neighborhood pretty residential. Commerce and Coogee Beach just a short walk.
David was a very nice and hepful host, we loved it to stay in his Apartment :) it was always clean and tidy.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

When I arrived at Sydney, I received David's message about our arrival time, and let us know the room is ready. The house of David is very easy to find. The house is big. The manager helped us to check in and introduced the use of the house in detail.The room is very big. The bed and storage space are large, The room is tidy and have a TV, even though our English is not very good, Johnny patiently explain for us.There are a lot of rooms. The kitchen has adequate facilities.The tenant from Brazil and France, and all people are very friendly, liking to chat. You can know many friends here, in addition to go out a few steps to reach the beach. The scenery is very beautiful.There are a lot of lines, bus station to attractions which is very convenient.Johnny is very keen to send us to the destination when we leave. The people are very good and here is a very worth to stay.David and Johnny are nice, and I hope I can come here again next time.

The house is a big house shared by usually long term tenants (months to years). All of them have been lovely and made me feel very welcome even if I was there for a short amount of time. 
The room was immense and everything was super clean. 
The location is perfect for access to Coogee beach and multiple food options. Many buses options also to go to CBD.
All in all probably one of the best air BnB I've been to.
great experience!

David’s place is full of really nice guests and very close to bars, cafes, shops, transport and beaches. We loved staying here, the place is well equipped with cooking and cleaning facilities. Only downside is the slow Wi-Fi but I believe David is already on the case! Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to visit Sydney but wants to stay near the coast!
